abstract: Several changes have been made to United States Open tennis tournament for 2015, including nearly-completed retractable roof on Arthur Ashe Stadium.
lead_paragraph: Arthur Ashe Stadium has a different look after the construction of part of a retractable roof. Another change is that the men’s final is scheduled for a Sunday instead of a Monday.

headline.main: What’s New at the U.S. Open? Start at the Top
headline.print_headline: What’s New at the Open? Start at the Top

snippet: Arthur Ashe Stadium has a different look after the construction of part of a retractable roof. Another change is that the men’s final is scheduled for a Sunday instead of a Monday.
